price: And the people of Noah [were also destroyed] before them. They were indeed a rebellious people.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
